description: Andrei Nemov asks if he can introduce Lucas to three of his hunky pals. Naturally, Lucas agrees and soon his hotel room is the scene of a scorching fiveway. Rimming and daisy-chain sucking lead to fucking, as Nemov and the boyish Ivan Lomav bottom for Lucas, crew-cut Oleg Popov and beautiful brunet Sasha Byazrov.
title: Michael Lucas, Andrei Nemov, Ivan Lomov, Oleg Popov, Sasha Byazrov
